name: Riposte
description: When an enemy misses you in melee combat, you can spend 2 Focus to immediately counterattack with +2 to hit.

name: Shield Ally
description: You can spend 1 Focus to impose disadvantage on an attack against an ally within reach. You must be aware of the attack.

name: Weapon Master
description: Choose one weapon type (blade, bow, brawl). You gain +1 to all attacks with that weapon type.

name: Smoke Step
description: Spend 3 Focus to disappear from sight and reappear up to 30 feet away in a location you can see. Enemies must make a check to track you.

name: Backstab
description: When attacking an unaware or distracted enemy, spend 2 Focus to deal double damage.

name: Evasion
description: When you would take damage from an area effect, spend 1 Focus to take half damage instead (or no damage on a successful save).

name: Quick Ritual
description: You can perform simple rituals in 1 minute instead of 10. Spend 2 Focus to cast a minor ward, detect magic, or create light.

name: Ward
description: Spend 3 Focus to create a protective barrier. You or an ally gains +2 to defense for the rest of the scene.

name: Seer's Eye
description: Spend 2 Focus to gain a vision of recent events in a location, or ask the Narrator one yes/no question about the scene.

name: Iron Will
description: You gain advantage on checks to resist fear, charm, or mental manipulation. Passive talent (no Focus cost).
